ygData.subject: Re: Halo of Light spell
ygData.msgSnippet: It can be found in Neriak, I have purchased the spell and use it myself.  I play on the Veeshan server, if you are on the same feel free to send a message to
ygData.messageBody:
It can be found in Neriak, I have purchased the spell and use it myself. I
play on the Veeshan server, if you are on the same feel free to send a
message to me and I will gladly purchase the spell for you and meet you
somewhere.

Alaia, Dark Elf Wiz, Veeshan



At 10:35 PM 5/11/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: Gregory Egan <gemd@...>
>
>Thanks to all who responded to my question about level 12 spells. I decided
>to get Halo of Light, but cannot find it anywhere (I am in Qeynos). Anyone
>know where this can be purchased? Thanks again.
>
>Greg (Kronan)
>

>Are you hogging all the fun?
